name: James Summer: Endless Waterslide
description:
Do you want to feel the thrilled speed? Then, welcome.
Slide as far as you can!

A simple yet addicting game - James Summer: Endless Waterslide! Jump to avoid alligators and jaws. Slide as far as you can. Not as easy as it looks. Focus on your fingertips! Kick the sizzling summer heat with James Summer!

CAUTION
- When you go down and down, the sliding speed is faster and faster. Please go to toilet before playing James Summer!

FEATURES
- Play with around 50 characters
- Avoid the endless enemies and get points
- Feel with the thrill speed sliding

Get the latest game news at kkiruk studio pages
https://www.facebook.com/kkirukstudio
